knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r load_packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r read_data}
homicide_data <- read_csv("data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r data_cleaning}
homicide_data %>% 
  filter(city == "Baltimore") %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date),
         reported_month = month(reported_date))
  
```
